channel.title: Remi J. Minnebo
channel.description: Recent content on Remi J. Minnebo

item.title: About me!
item.description: 👋 Hi, I’m Remi and I’m the Cloud architectr at Alter Domus! 👀 I’m interested in everything related to Cloud Native! 💞️ In my spare time I keep myself busy with cycling, astronomy and the financial markets. 👀 Looking to collaborate on cloud native security/observability tooling! 📫 How to reach me: remi@minnebo.io
